title: Embroidery Sample
description: off-white background; applied 2-3/4\" black border, tapered at upper corners; 7/8\" machine embroidered rayon tape in blue, pink and turquoise; applied 5/8\" rayon tape--brown, blue, green, grey; running panel is heavily embroidered with fanciful animals, flora and pagodas in multicolors
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
